document.full_text: euro zone finance ministers are likely to back a bailout for portugal on monday and tell greece it must deliver on agreed fiscal and privatization targets if it wants new emergency financing next year.
document.title: euro finance ministers to pressure greece, approve portugal aid
lines_and_colors: euro zone finance ministers are likely to back a bailout for portugal on monday and tell greece it must deliver on agreed fiscal and privatization targets if it wants new emergency financing next year.
